sys_script_include.name: PDFGenerator

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_3cd3b76147fdea1028da392f316d43e4
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1755799_formpdf.PDFGenerator</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>PDFGenerator</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var PDFGeneratorUtils = Class.create();
PDFGeneratorUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
    
    /**
     * Generate PDF for a given record
     * @param {string} tableName - The table name
     * @param {string} sysId - The record sys_id
     * @returns {string} PDF file URL
     */
    generatePDF: function(tableName, sysId) {
        try {
            // ServiceNow's built-in PDF generation endpoint
            var pdfEndpoint = '/' + tableName + '.do?sys_id=' + sysId + '&sysparm_view=export_to_pdf&PDF';
            return pdfEndpoint;
        } catch (ex) {
            gs.error('Error generating PDF: ' + ex.getMessage());
            return null;
        }
    },
    
    type: 'PDFGeneratorUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-05-29 06:16:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>3cd3b76147fdea1028da392f316d43e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>22</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PDFGenerator</sys_name><sys_package display_value="FormPDF Sync" source="x_1755799_formpdf">aea3b36147fdea1028da392f316d438c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="FormPDF Sync">aea3b36147fdea1028da392f316d438c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3cd3b76147fdea1028da392f316d43e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-05-30 07:36:27</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
